string-array.name: temple_address
string-array.item: Pazhavangadi, Near East Fort, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala

string-array.name: temple_description
string-array.item: A temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu reclining in yogic sleep on a serpant. The temple is built in an intricate fusion of the indigenous Kerala style and the Tamil style of architecture associated with the temples located in the neighbouring state of Tamil Nadu, featuring high walls, and a 16th-century Gopuram.
A temple dedicated to Goddess Kannagi and is known for its female-focused annual festival called Attukal Pongala.
An ancient temple, 600 years old, dedicated to Goddess Chamundi, it is located at Karikkakom, around 7 km north of Sree Padmanabhaswamy temple.

Situated at East Fort in the heart of the city, the main deity of the temple is Sri Mahaganapathy in a seated posture with the right leg in a folded stance. The temple is situated in close proximity to the Sri Padmanabhaswamy temple.
A temple situated in the heart of the city, this temple is more than 700 years old. It is dedicated to Lord Shiva.
Ancient Hindu temple where devotees pay homage to ancestors and after-death ceremonies are performed.

string-array.name: touristPlace_address
string-array.item: LMS Vellayambalam Road, Near Museum Junction, Palayam, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala
KINFRA Film and Video Park, Kazhakuttom, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala
PMG Junction, Vikas Bhavan P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala

string-array.name: touristPlace_description
string-array.item: The Sri Chithra Art Gallery or Napier Museum is an art and natural history museum. Architecturally unique 19th-century building with archeological and historical artifacts along with art display.

The Thiruvananthapuram Zoo is located in the city of Thiruvananthapuram and occupies 55 acres of woodland, lakes, and lawns, consisting of a sprawling conservatory and zoo featuring a wide variety of domestic and exotic animals.
A scenic lake with a beach, playground, floating cafe and sculptures, plus activities such as boating. The lake flows into the Arabian Sea.
Shankhumugham is a beach on the western side of Thiruvananthapuram, situated very near to Trivandrum International Airport.

Kovalam is a small coastal town in Kerala, south of Thiruvananthapuram. At the southern end of Lighthouse Beach is a striped lighthouse with a viewing platform. Palm-backed beaches also include Hawa Beach and Samudra Beach. Heading south, Vizhinjam Juma Masjid mosque overlooks the busy fishing harbor. Inland, Sagarika Marine Research Aquarium displays technology used in pearl production.
World\'s first magic themed park devoted to the practice of magic, with street performances, aerialists and a museum. It was founded by the famous magician Shri Gopinath Muthukad.

An autonomous institution established by The Government of Kerala in 1984, it contains educational exhibits and activities illustrating scientific principles, along with a planetarium and 3D films for popularisation of science and scientific temper among the general public.

string-array.name: restaurant_description
string-array.item: The Indian Coffee House is one of the prominent landmarks in the Thampanoor area of Thiruvananthapuram designed by architect Laurie Baker. Both the railway station as well as the bus terminal are located nearby. All kinds of snacks are available here.
Lt. Col Karma\'s Up North is a restaurant in Vazhuthacadu, Thiruvananthapuram, that serves delicious North Indian vegetarian dishes only. Almost all north Indian dishes are available here.
Authentic Kerala cuisine, Indian, and Chinese come under one roof in this restaurant set in a restored traditional house with multi themed ambience.
A unique natural food restaurant in Thiruvananthapuram, offering food that is not only delicious but also good for the body.
Upscale global cuisine presented in an elegant, restored 18th-century home with a garden patio.
Vegetarian dishes and rice are ladled onto banana leaves at this simple Indian restaurant.
Open House Kitchens near Dhanya Remya Theatre and Ayurvedha College at Kunnumpuram is known for its variety of chicken dishes.
Famous for Middle Eastern dishes, this restaurant chain was created in 1979 and is also known for its ice creams.
A haven for vegetarians where pure vegetarian dishes can be ordered round the clock. Known for its authentic Kerala taste and freshness.
A chinese food restaurant at Vivanta by Taj at Trivandrum. Beautiful and grand restaurant with beautiful ambience.
